description:
Course Update - April 2016 I updated the entire course to reflect changes in OBS.

    Screen capture video is a good way to get started with video creation and editing, regardless of whether you want to create videos tutorials, e courses, or even marketing videos.

    Once you are comfortable creating screen capture videos, you can step up to the next level with webcam or even a DSLR videos.

  • Do you want to make screen capture presentation videos that look and sound great?
  • You don't have much experience with video or audio recording tools?
  • Or, you know a something about making video but want to take it to the next level
  • You don't want to spend too much money to get started?
  • You don't want to waste a lot of time, and want to get started fast

If that's you, then this course is for you.

You will learn how to

Use a free software that runs in Windows, OS X and Linux. 

It is very flexible, is powerful, yet is easy to learn and use without a steep learning curve like other video software. There are some tips to get the settings right for sharp, high quality screen recording.

Video capture software can cost hundred of dollars, and requires a lot of time just to get your first video out.

In this course:-

  • I will explain the important settings for you to get started,
  • I'll show you how to start with a simple screen capture video before proceeding to more advance video recording that includes recording your webcam creating a picture-in-picture effect
  • you will also be able to do green screen or chroma key video right from your home or office studio

This course takes just under 1 hour. The reason you see 2 hours total is because I cover both versions OBS.
title: Screen Capture Videos With Open Broadcaster Software
